H0.text: Solar energy is the alternative energy resource that changes part of a river into a lake.

H1.text: Geothermal energy, an alternative energy resource, changes part of a river into a lake.

H2.text: Hydropower changes part of a river into a lake.

H3.text: Biofuel energy changes part of a river into a lake.

A4.text: Reservoirs created by dams not only suppress floods but also provide water for activities such as irrigation, human consumption, industrial use, aquaculture, and navigability.
